Yep, this week we are going to discuss proposed new character classes 
that are promotions of existing classes.

I'll start it with Asassin (spelling) as a promotion of a thief.

I'd like it to keep the ability to cloak, but add a side effect of 
being able to see invisible opponents.  Any more ideas?
